html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2001-10292001-06-050,  ,  IA&ND,  , 
PrecisRe-appointment of ROBERT W. HORNAL, of Vancouver, British Columbia, as Chairman of the Environmental Impact Review Board, for a term of three years, effective June 9, 2001; re-appointment of TOM BUTTERS, of Inuvik, Northwest Territories, as a permanent member of the Environmental Impact Review Board for a term of three years, effective June 12, 2001; and re-appointment of ANDREW WILLIAMS, of Whitehorse, Yukon Territory, as a permanent member of the Environmental Impact Review Board, for a term of three years, effective July 6, 2001.
Attachments
